pullRequest.title: [eclipse/xtext-xtend#1132] do restriction checks also on type literal member feature calls
pullRequest.bodyText:
[eclipse/xtext-xtend#1132] do restriction checks also on type literal member feature calls
Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich christian.dietrich@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText: am not sure if we should treat nested types separately. java also gives 2 errors
This is not the declaringType but a referencedType
This likely not the feature you want to highlight. I'd pass XAbstractFeatureCall_feature instead.
Should probably be defined for XAbstractMemberFeatureCall, otherwise we'll only have the warning on the import but not on the reference.
